job_description:
Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role for a

SupportIntern at InternshipStudio located in Pune. We are seeking a motivated Support Intern to join our team and assist in providing outstanding customer support. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, a strong customer-centric approach, and a willingness to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.

Key Responsibilities:
 Handle incoming customer calls and emails professionally and courteously.
 Provide timely and effective support to customers by troubleshooting issues and resolving inquiries promptly.
 Create and manage support tickets using our internal ticketing system, ensuring accurate documentation of customer interactions and resolutions.

Collaborate with other team members to escalate complex issues and ensure timely resolution.
 Communicate effectively with customers to provide status updates, gather additional information, and ensure a positive support experience.

Qualifications:
 Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in any field or equivalent practical experience.
 Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey technical information clearly and concisely.
 Customer-focused mindset with a passion for delivering exceptional service.
 Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively in a fast-paced environment.
 Proficiency in using computer applications and familiarity with customer support software is a plus.
 Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and processes.

Experience - Freshers

Location - Baner (Work From Office)

Stipend - 3000 to 5000 per month

Notice Period- Immediate Joiner,

job_description:
[bold] Job Summary Job Summary As a Frontend React.js Developer, you will be in charge of developing compelling user interfaces and interactive online applications with React.js. You'll collaborate with designers and backend engineers to create responsive designs, integrate APIs, and improve application performance. [bold] Key Responsibilities Key Responsibilities Convert UI/UX designs to high-quality code using React.js and other frontend technologies. Create reusable React components and frameworks to expedite development and ensure consistency across the application. Use Redux, Context API, or other state management tools to effectively manage application state and data flow. Integrate with backend APIs and services to access and manipulate data. Optimize frontend performance by identifying bottlenecks in rendering, network queries, and overall application performance. Write clean, maintainable code that adheres to best practices and coding standards. Conduct unit and integration testing to verify code quality and dependability. [bold] Experience and Qualifications Experience and Qualifications Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline. 
 Experienced Frontend Developer specializing on React.js development. 
 Proficient in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and other frontend technologies. 
 Extensive knowledge of React.js and its fundamental principles, including virtual DOM, JSX, and component-based architecture. 
 Experience with state management libraries/frameworks, such as Redux or Context API. 
 Experience using frontend build technologies like Webpack, Babel, and npm/yarn. 
 Expertise in responsive design and CSS preprocessors such as Sass or LESS. 
 Experience with RESTful APIs and AJAX. .

skill_list: Curriculum implementation, Teacher development, Student assessment, Parental involvement, Classroom environment, Administrative responsibilities
job_description:
To lead the planning and execution of the Cambridge Early Years curriculum, supporting and guiding pre-primary teachers to create a nurturing, developmentally appropriate learning environment that fosters the physical, emotional, cognitive, and social development of young children.

Key Responsibilities
 Curriculum implementation:

Ensure the effective delivery of the Cambridge Early Years curriculum across all pre-primary classrooms.

Collaborate with teachers to plan and implement lessons that align with the Cambridge Early Years framework, emphasizing holistic child development.

Regularly review and update curriculum materials and teaching resources to ensure they meet Cambridge standards.
 Teacher development and support:

Provide coaching, mentoring, and professional development opportunities for pre-primary teachers to ensure they are well-prepared to deliver the Cambridge curriculum.

Conduct regular classroom observations to provide constructive feedback and support to teachers.
 Student assessment and development:

Guide teachers in assessing young children's progress using developmentally appropriate tools and Cambridge Early Years assessment methods.

Ensure that assessments reflect a child's development in key areas, including communication, physical development, personal-social development, and early literacy and numeracy.
 Parental involvement:

Organize and lead parent-teacher meetings to discuss the progress and development of pre-primary students.

Provide parents with regular updates on their childs development and ways they can support learning at home.

Address any parental concerns related to the pre-primary program and Cambridge curriculum implementation.
 Classroom environment:

Ensure that classrooms are set up in a manner that fosters exploration, creativity, and learning in a safe and nurturing environment.

Assist teachers in creating developmentally appropriate activities and experiences that support all areas of a childs development.

Ensure compliance with health and safety standards in all pre-primary classrooms.
 Administrative responsibilities:

Maintain records of student progress, attendance, and teacher performance.

Develop and oversee the implementation of policies related to early childhood education.

Coordinate with school administration on scheduling, resource allocation, and reporting requirements.

About Company: Our sole aim at MentorBoxx is to bridge the gap between universities & industries. We select 30 students every month to regularly interact with the right industry experts, work on live industry projects, and grasp as much industry knowledge as possible.,

job_description:
Job Purpose

To oversee the implementation of the Cambridge International curriculum, ensuring high academic standards, supporting teachers with lesson planning, and maintaining an effective and well-organized learning environment.

Key Responsibilities
 Curriculum management:
 Ensure that the Cambridge curriculum is delivered effectively across all grades.
 Collaborate with teachers to develop lesson plans that align with Cambridge standards and objectives.
 Review and update curriculum materials as required, ensuring they meet Cambridge guidelines.
 Teacher support:
 Assist in the recruitment and onboarding of qualified Cambridge teachers.
 Provide ongoing support, coaching, and training to teaching staff.
 Monitor and evaluate teacher performance, providing feedback for continuous improvement.
 Student assessment:
 Oversee the implementation of Cambridge assessments and examinations.
 Analyze student performance data to identify areas for improvement.
 Collaborate with teachers to create intervention plans for students who need additional support.
 Parental engagement:
 Organize parent-teacher meetings to discuss student progress.
 Act as a liaison between parents and the school administration on academic matters.
 Address parental concerns regarding the Cambridge curriculum and student performance.
 Administrative duties:
 Maintain accurate academic records, including grades, attendance, and student progress reports.
 Coordinate and participate in Cambridge training sessions, workshops, and seminars.
 Assist in the development of school policies related to academics and student conduct.

skill_list: Client Relationship Management, Business Development, Product Promotion, Customer Service, Market Analysis, Documentation, Compliance, Reporting,Sales Targets, CrossSelling
job_description:
Client Relationship Management: Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients in the assigned territory or market segment.  Business Development: Identify new business opportunities and proactively market financial products (loans and related services) to potential customers.  Product Promotion: Effectively communicate and promote various financial products offered by the organization to prospective clients.  Sales Targets: Achieve sales targets by effectively managing leads, conversions, and client retention strategies.  Customer Service: Provide excellent customer service to clients, addressing their queries and resolving any issues promptly and professionally.  Market Analysis: Stay updated with market trends, competitor activities, and changes in regulations to identify opportunities and potential risks.  Cross-Selling: Identify cross-selling opportunities and recommend appropriate financial products to clients to meet their needs.  Documentation: Ensure accurate and timely documentation of all client interactions, transactions, and sales related activities.  Compliance: Adhere to the company's policies, procedures, and regulatory guidelines to maintain compliance at all times.  Reporting: Provide regular reports on sales activities, market insights, and customer feedback to the management team.

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:
 Health insurance
 Paid sick time
 Provident Fund

Schedule:
 Day shift
 Weekend availability

Education:
 Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:
 total work: 2 years (Preferred)
 Sales: 2 years (Preferred)
 Financial services: 2 years (Preferred)

Language:
 English (Preferred)

Work Location: In person,

skill_list: Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Tracking, Tagging, Collaboration, Content Writing,Data Annotation, Labeling, Generating Prompts, AIML, Annotating Data, 2D3D Bounding Boxes, Image Labeling, Video Labeling, Fastpaced Environment
job_description:
The role entitles tracking, annotation, labeling, and generating prompts & contents for datasets for training the machine learning algorithms. The Data Annotation Specialist has the responsibility to create & curate sets of data specifically created for computer vision & future technologies by using a combination of tracking, annotation, labeling, and generating prompts & content on images, videos, or audio. As a member of the Data Annotation team, you will help us Annotate data for use within a larger machine learning & AI/ML framework. You will be part of a great international team of scientists & professionals who bring cutting-edge technology in verticals like Autonomous Driving to the auto industry as well as working for industries like Retail, Medi-tech, Agri-tech, Gen AI, etc. that will all benefit from machine learning & ai in the near future. joining our team means playing an integral role in bettering the world with science & technology.

Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include
 Accurately label and annotate data in all formats before it reaches the end customer.
 Annotate and label 2D/3D bounding boxes for various industries.
 Tag and track while working on sports annotation.
 Collaborate with teammates, label images, and provide feedback to clients" engineers and data scientists to improve tools and algorithms.
 Write content while viewing images and videos to train the next level of ChatGPT.
 Work in a fast-paced environment that requires high accuracy, attention, and detail.

About Company: Our sole aim at MentorBoxx is to bridge the gap between universities & industries. We select 30 students every month to regularly interact with the right industry experts, work on live industry projects, and grasp as much industry knowledge as possible.,
